auth.notes: Odoo JSON-RPC/XML-RPC auth is typically via user credentials and a database name. Many deployments use user API keys (treat as api_key) or a session cookie.

limits.notes: Self-hosted; treat rate limits and concurrency as deployment-specific and versioned per tenant.

events.notes: No standard outbound webhooks in core. Polling is the portable baseline unless a deployment provides an event bridge.

idempotency.notes: No generic idempotency key. Use adapter-side dedupe via read-before-write and stable external keys (custom fields or unique constraints).

diff.notes: Verified effects via post-write reads. Predicted effects require adapter-side simulation (no provider dry-run surface).

capabilities.notes: Partner writes affect customer/vendor master data and can have downstream billing/accounting effects. Default to HumanApprove.

notes: Initial matrix derived from Odoo ORM model semantics (res.partner + extensions). Expand once accounting moves/invoices/payments are extracted and verified.
